item.title: 美国公司有 17.6 亿美元的机会释放现金
item.description: 由于利率预计将在一段时间内居高不下，企业财务总监们有强烈的动机跳过债务市场，释放出更多的公司现金。事实证明，他们拥有大量现金。【原文：With rates expected to stay high for a while, corporate finance chiefs have a strong incentive to skip debt markets and free up more of their companies’ cash instead. And it turns out, they have plenty of it.】

item.title: 穆迪称私人信贷面临高利率带来的痛苦
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二发布的一份报告显示，随着利率的长期走高给借款人造成压力，并使贷款人蒙受损失，私人信贷市场将进入一个紧张时期。【原文：The private credit market is headed for a period of stress as higher-for-longer interest rates strain borrowers and saddle lenders with losses, according to a report Tuesday from Moody’s Ratings.】

Moller - Maersk A/S said a successful rival bidder fell short of tender requirements as it seeks to overturn the award of a concession to run and expand sub-Saharan Africa’s biggest container port to Filipino billionaire Enrique Razon’s harbor firm.】

item.title: 瑞典央行对可能的降息疑虑重重：决策指南

item.title: 瑞银在瑞士改革前就已增资 200 亿美元

item.title: 中国连续第 18 个月掀起黄金购买热潮
item.description: 中国央行 4 月份连续第 18 个月扩大黄金储备，延续了帮助推动贵金属创下历史新高的购买热潮。【原文：China’s central bank expanded its gold reserves for an 18th straight month in April, extending a buying spree that helped drive the precious metal to a record high.】
